bib.title: Multi-label classification using error correcting output codes
bib.author: Kajdanowicz, Tomasz and Kazienko, Przemyslaw
bib.abstract: EN A framework for multi-label classification extended by Error Correcting Output Codes (ECOCs) is introduced and empirically examined in the article. The solution assumes the base multi-label classifiers to be a noisy channel and applies ECOCs in order to recover the classification errors made by individual classifiers. The framework was examined through exhaustive studies over combinations of three distinct classification algorithms and four ECOC methods employed in the multi-label classification problem. The experimental results
bib.journal: International Journal of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science
